DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a registry with safety and efficacy data on the use of etanercept in clinical practice in Taiwan.
DOC.brief_title: Registry of Etanercept Use in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis in Clinical Practice in Taiwan
DOC.criteria: Main 1) Male or female patients aged > 20 years; 2) Patients who have already been selected and approved under the Taiwan National Health Insurance Program to receive 24 weeks of etanercept for rheumatoid arthritis. Main None
